registration.name: @:service-manager
registration.p1: [[@:service-manager]] supports the full lifecycle for deploying, managing and upgrading services deployed in the Control Plane.
registration.p2: Register an existing [[@:service-manager]] to allow Console administrators to view services.
registration.p3: When registering, choose a unique, recognizable name so that your developers can easily know which [[@:service-manager]] endpoint they are working with.
registration.tagline: [[@:service-manager]] allows you to view the services deployed in the Control Plane.
